attributes.action: Educate us on the function of government/ PM's remit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many a time in this excellent site, it is said "beyond the remit of the PM" in response to a petion.
Also, there are many silly petitions, some meant to be, some clearly uneducated or plain stupid.
I believe this is the result that the govt./PM are not informing us of their real role, their true powers, what they can do, and can't, for example make a law that affects a japanese product under another law/country.
So I request that the PM/govt. actually tell us what is their duty, remit what they can do for us, and what they cannot, to prevent hard feelings, and better understand and be able to judge if he IS doing a good job.
What is he/they REALLY there to do?
